sui4
HSK 1: 歲,岁
HSK 5: 碎
HSK 6: 隧
Freq: 9863

Related Character(s): 𦼯, 穗
Связанный символ (и): 𦼯, шип
穟是汉字，拼音suì，是麦类植物穗的专用叫法，因为五谷里在没有其它种类果实带有针芒。
所有出现穟的典故如：韩愈《赛神》：麦苗含穟桑生椹,共向田头乐社神。李贺《艾如张》：陇东卧穟满风雨,莫信笼媒陇西去。等等，这些带有穟的描述对象都是小麦。
穟 is a Chinese character, pinyin suì, which is the special name for wheat ears, because there are no other types of fruits with needle awns in grains.
All the allusions appearing in the 穟 are such as: Han Yu's "Sai Shen": The wheat seedlings contain the 穟 mulberry and the vines, and they share the god of the Tiantou Le Shrine. Li He's "Ai Ru Zhang": Lying in the east of Gansu, full of wind and rain, do not believe that the cage media will go to the west of Gansu. Wait, these stubborn description objects are all wheat.

穟字的基本解释

穟
suì
指禾穗上的芒须。
〔穟穟〕（禾苗）美好的样子，如“禾颖穟穟。”
古同“穗”：“嘉穟养南畴。”

穟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suì］
［《廣韻》徐醉切，去至，邪。］
亦作“穂1”。
(1)禾穗成熟下垂貌。参见“穟穟”。
(2)稻、麦等穗上的芒须。
(3)通“穗”。谷类结实的顶端部分。
(4)用作穗状之物的量词。

穟字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　穟； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页860第32
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?徐醉切，音遂。禾秀。【說文】禾?之貌。【詩·大雅】禾役穟穟。【傳】穟穟，苗好美也。　【五音集韻】亦作?。

穟字的源字形

穟字的起名意思

1、禾穗成熟下垂貌；2、稻﹑麦等穗上的芒须；3、通"穗"。谷类结实的顶端部分；4、用作穗状之物的量词。

Basic explanation of words
ear
suì
Refers to the beard on the ear of grass.
〔穟穟穟] (He Miao) beautiful appearance, such as "He Ying穟穟."
Gu Tong "Sui": "Jiarong raises Nanchou."
ear
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suì］
["Guang Yun" Xu Zui cut, go to the end, evil. ]
Also known as "Hang 1".
(1) The ears of grass are mature and drooping. See "穟穟".
(2) The beard on the ears of rice and wheat.
(3) Through "sui". The sturdy top part of the grain.
(4) Used as a measure word for spike-shaped things.

Old glyph
ear
Name meaning
1. The ears are mature and drooping; 2. The awns on the ears of rice, wheat, etc.; 3. The "ears" are connected. The sturdy top part of cereals; 4. Used as a quantifier for spikes.
